ema nisa 2018 janawari 27, 28 saha pebarawari 03 yana dinayanhi pawathwimata niyamitha ganakadhikari sewa simitha/wiwrutha tharaga wibhagaya 2018 palath palana mathiwaranaya awasan wimen pasu sadharana kalasimawak thula pawathwana men apa sangamaya adala siyalu parshawayan gen karunikawa illa sitimu.

tabu nan kiyanne, meka bhauthika widyawen wisthara karanna puluwan kiyala.

thissi anuradhi dodangodi..akke..onnamath brek nathiwama awith kiyanawa menna mehema...subhama subha upan dinayak wewa akke..wena awuruduwala wage neweyi balapan akke meda awurudde akkata nandunana hugak aya subha pathanawa.ee hamoma ara pissu lokkage manussa hadawatha anduragaththu udawiya..ithin ee hadawathe sinnakkara urumakariya wechchi akkata api hamoma subha pathanne bohoma awanka pirisidu hithwalinmayi.me upan dineta kamathi onama deyak prarthana karahan akke..eeka ee widiyatama siddha wewi...(anna ara pissu lokkawa gama rata genna ganin ban akke me awuruddewath..)

jiwithaye nisi wayasata kala yuthu da kal thabimen manushya jiwithaya arbudayata yana ayuru menma jothishya wani mithya wishwasha hethu kota gena boho denekge jiwitha awul kala athi aakaraya wiktar ayiwan mahatha wishishta lesa dakwa atha.mehi “minisun ge iranama grahatharaka walata bada thabu jothishyata thibu piliganima nathi bhanga kirima aarambha kale eka wita jothishya shrasthrarthayek wuda widyanyayek wuda koparniks wisini”.(pita 143).
ee kale ithin ganithata akamaththak thibune na.

mokada maha bankuwath kiyanawa ee gollanatath ayithiyak thiyenawa me mudal huwamaruwa pilibadawa yam wagakimak ganna.ee nisa awasana thiranayak na parlimenathuwata aawamane eeka awasana thiranaya ganne.namuth kawuru adhikshanaya karath kashlas sosayiti kiyana eka plastik kad eka pawichchi karana eka samajayata yanawa.eekata api lasthiwenna oone.danata katawath meka dila na.parlimenthu panathakinne meka enna oone.ethakam mukuth karanna ba.

kawara ekolosekina yath: mahaneni, me lokayehi gopalu (gerirala gananin ho sudu rathu pahayen) gorupa no danne we da, (geri sirurehi dunu-siri-thisul aadi) lakunehi daksha no we da, (wenehi kanukatuyen samabun thana nilamassan lu) masibiju no harane we da, (geri anga hatagath) wana (beheth la) no wasanne we da, (masimaduru walahanu sandaha gowadehi) dum no karanne we da, (gerin basiya yuthu) thotupala no dani da, (gerin) panaya kala no kala bawa no dani da, gamanmaga no dani da, gerin hasirawiya yuthu thanhi (thanabimhi) adaksha we da, (wasu pinisa) ithiri no kota kiri dowanasulu we da, gopithru wu goparinayaka wu yam wahaphu adda, unata wishesha salakili no dakwanne we da, mahaneni, me ekolos anggayen yuktha gopalu gerimula palanaya karannata wadi karannata nonisi weyi.

merata prathama hadawath baddhaya sidukara me wanawita masayaka kalayak gathawa thibe.anuradhapuraye jiwathwu this haya hawiridi dedaru mawaka wana pushpa kumari ada jiwath wanne masayakata pera melowa haragiya pradip kumara sampathge hadawathani.pradip miyagiyada ohuge hadawatha me mohotheda nonawathi gaheyi.hadisi anathuru walata lakwa ho adhirudhira pidanaya wani rogi thaththwayan hethuwen hise le nahara pupura yamen dadi sathkara eekaka thula yanthra aadharayen jiwithaya gatagasa thibena roginge molaya miya giya awasthawala owunge sharira awayawa thawath ayekuta baddha kirima sandaha labagatha hakiya.rogiyage langama gnyathiyage ho gnyathinge kamaththa matha ese laba ganna wakugadu ha akma thawath pudgalayakuta ho kihipadenakuta baddha kala awastha rasak meratin wartha weyi.ese wuwath hadawath baddha kirima sambandhawa pasugiya juli masa 07 dina dakwama apata thibune sihinayak pamani.lowa prathama hadawath baddhaya dakunu aprikawe aacharya kristiyan barnad sidukara dashaka pahak gewi thibunada hruda ha uras shalyaya wisheshagnya waidya anil abewikrama mahatha mulika wi mema hadawath baddhaya sidukarana thek mema athi awadhanam shalyakarmaya sidu kirimata merata siti kisidu hruda ha uras shalyaya waidyawarayaku awadhanaya yomukara nothibini.
